message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously designed to meet your needs and exceed your expectations. This product comes with a wealth of features and benefits that are tailored to provide exceptional value and convenience. Given its quality and capabilities, we believe it's worth more than $8000 to you. For this incredible opportunity, I am extending an exclusive offer of $12000. Please let me know if you're interested in discussing further details or proceeding with the purchase.
